Name: Coptic textile
Description: Tabulae,approximately quadrangular in shape, made in tapestry technique. In the centre, enclosed in a circle and standing out against a natural ground flecked with purple, is a rhomboid motif with leaves on the vertices. The corners are decorated with double heart-shaped leaves. All around the central motif an undulating design of lanceolate leaves unfolds itself, alternately red and green in colour.
